transaction_set_identifier_code_01.description:
Code uniquely identifying a Transaction Set.

- The transaction set identifier (ST01) is used by the translation routines of the interchange partners to select the appropriate transaction set definition (e.g., 810 selects the Invoice Transaction Set).
transaction_set_identifier_code_01.title: Transaction Set Identifier Code

transaction_set_control_number_02.description: Identifying control number that must be unique within the transaction set functional group assigned by the originator for a transaction set.
transaction_set_control_number_02.title: Transaction Set Control Number

transaction_set_header_ST.description: To indicate the start of a transaction set and to assign a control number.
transaction_set_header_ST.title: Transaction Set Header

date_01.description: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year- BIG01 is the invoice issue date.
date_01.title: Date

date_03.description: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year- BIG03 is the date assigned by the purchaser to purchase order.
date_03.title: Date

purchase_order_number_04.description: Identifying number for Purchase Order assigned by the orderer/purchaser.
purchase_order_number_04.title: Purchase Order Number

beginning_segment_for_invoice_BIG.description: To indicate the beginning of an invoice transaction set and transmit identifying numbers and dates.
beginning_segment_for_invoice_BIG.title: Beginning Segment For Invoice

note_reference_code_01.description: Code identifying the functional area or purpose for which the note applies.
note_reference_code_01.title: Note Reference Code

description_02.description: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content.
description_02.title: Description

items.description: To transmit information in a free-form format, if necessary, for comment or special instruction.

reference_identification_02.description: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier.
reference_identification_02.title: Reference Identification

entity_identifier_code_01.description: Code identifying an organizational entity, a physical location, property or an individual.
entity_identifier_code_01.title: Entity Identifier Code

identification_code_qualifier_03.description: Code designating the system/method of code structure used for Identification Code (67).

9.description: D-U-N-S+4, D-U-N-S Number with Four Character Suffix

91.description: Assigned by Seller or Seller's Agent

92.description: Assigned by Buyer or Buyer's Agent

identification_code_qualifier_03.title: Identification Code Qualifier

identification_code_04.description: Code identifying a party or other code.- This segment, used alone, provides the most efficient method of providing organizational identification. To obtain this efficiency the "ID Code" (N104) must provide a key to the table maintained by the transaction processing party.
identification_code_04.title: Identification Code

party_identification_N1.description:
To identify a party by type of organization, name, and code.
Note: When 850 BEG02=DS and N101=ST the N103 and N104 Required NOT to be sent 
 When 850 BEG02=DS and N101=BY the N103 and N104 is REQUIRED indicating the buying DC
party_identification_N1.title: Party Identification

items.description: To specify the location of the named party.

city_name_01.description:
Free-form text for city name.
- A combination of either N401 through N404, or N405 and N406 may be adequate to specify a location.
city_name_01.title: City Name

state_or_province_code_02.description: Code (Standard State/Province) as defined by appropriate government agency.- N402 is required only if city name (N401) is in the U.S. or Canada.
state_or_province_code_02.title: State Or Province Code

postal_code_03.description: Code defining international postal zone code excluding punctuation and blanks (zip code for United States).
postal_code_03.title: Postal Code

geographic_location_N4.description: To specify the geographic place of the named party.
geographic_location_N4.title: Geographic Location

terms_type_code_01.description: Code identifying type of payment terms.- If the code in ITD01 is "04", then ITD07 or ITD09 is required and either ITD10 or ITD11 is required; if the code in ITD01 is "05", then ITD06 or ITD07 is required.
terms_type_code_01.title: Terms Type Code

terms_basis_date_code_02.description: Code identifying the beginning of the terms period.
terms_basis_date_code_02.title: Terms Basis Date Code

terms_net_due_date_06.description: Date when total invoice amount becomes due expressed in format CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year.
terms_net_due_date_06.title: Terms Net Due Date

terms_net_days_07.description: Number of days until total invoice amount is due (discount not applicable).
terms_net_days_07.title: Terms Net Days

description_12.description: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content.
description_12.title: Description

terms_of_sale_deferred_terms_of_sale_ITD.title: Terms Of Sale Deferred Terms Of Sale

date_time_qualifier_01.description: Code specifying type of date or time, or both date and time.
date_time_qualifier_01.title: Date Time Qualifier

date_02.description: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year.
date_02.title: Date

items.description: To specify pertinent dates and times.

shipment_method_of_payment_01.description: Code identifying payment terms for transportation charges- FOB01 indicates which party will pay the carrier.
shipment_method_of_payment_01.title: Shipment Method Of Payment

fob_related_instructions_FOB.description: To specify transportation instructions relating to shipment.
fob_related_instructions_FOB.title: Fob Related Instructions

unit_or_basis_for_measurement_code_03.description: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken.
unit_or_basis_for_measurement_code_03.title: Unit Or Basis For Measurement Code

unit_price_04.description: Price per unit of product, service, commodity, etc .
unit_price_04.title: Unit Price

product_service_id_qualifier_06.description:
Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234).

- IT106 through IT125 provide for ten different product/service IDs for each item. For example: Case, Color, Drawing No., U.P.C. No., ISBN No., Model No., or SKU.
product_service_id_qualifier_06.title: Product Service Id Qualifier

product_service_id_07.description: Identifying number for a product or service.
product_service_id_07.title: Product Service Id

product_service_id_qualifier_08.description: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234).
product_service_id_qualifier_08.title: Product Service Id Qualifier

baseline_item_data_invoice_IT1.description: To specify the basic and most frequently used line item data for the invoice and related transactions.
baseline_item_data_invoice_IT1.title: Baseline Item Data Invoice

unit_or_basis_for_measurement_code_02.title: Unit Or Basis For Measurement Code

items.description: To specify additional item details relating to variations between ordered and shipped quantities, or to specify alternate units of measures and quantities.

unit_price_03.description:
Price per unit of product, service, commodity, etc 

- See Figures Appendix for an example detailing the use of CTP03 and CTP04.
- See Figures Appendix for an example detailing the use of CTP03, CTP04 and CTP07.
unit_price_03.title: Unit Price

item_description_type_01.description: Code indicating the format of a description.- If PID01 equals "F", then PID05 is used. If PID01 equals "S", then PID04 is used. If PID01 equals "X", then both PID04 and PID05 are used.
item_description_type_01.title: Item Description Type

description_05.description: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content.
description_05.title: Description

product_item_description_PID.description: To describe a product or process in coded or free-form format.
product_item_description_PID.title: Product Item Description

pack_01.description: The number of inner containers, or number of eaches if there are no inner containers, per outer container.
pack_01.title: Pack

item_physical_details_PO4.description: To specify the physical qualities, packaging, weights, and dimensions relating to the item.
item_physical_details_PO4.title: Item Physical Details

allowance_or_charge_indicator_01.description:
Code which indicates an allowance or charge for the service specified.

- If SAC01 is "A" or "C", then at least one of SAC05, SAC07, or SAC08 is required.
allowance_or_charge_indicator_01.title: Allowance Or Charge Indicator

service_promotion_allowance_or_charge_co.description:
Code identifying the service, promotion, allowance, or charge.
Comment: Codes to be used where C350 sent on the Purchase Order for item level discounts.
service_promotion_allowance_or_charge_co.title: Service Promotion Allowance Or Charge Code

amount_05.description:
Monetary amount.
- SAC05 is the total amount for the service, promotion, allowance, or charge.
- If SAC05 is present with SAC07 or SAC08, then SAC05 takes precedence.
amount_05.title: Amount

allowance_or_charge_method_of_handling_c.description: Code indicating method of handling for an allowance or charge.
allowance_or_charge_method_of_handling_c.title: Allowance Or Charge Method Of Handling Code

description_15.description: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content.
description_15.title: Description

service_promotion_allowance_or_charge_in.description: To request or identify a service, promotion, allowance, or charge; to specify the amount or percentage for the service, promotion, allowance, or charge.
service_promotion_allowance_or_charge_in.title: Service Promotion Allowance Or Charge Information
Service Promotion Allowance Or Charge Information

amount_01.description:
Monetary amount.

- TDS01 is the total amount of invoice (including charges, less allowances) before terms discount (if discount is applicable).
amount_01.title: Amount

amount_02.description:
Monetary amount.

- TDS02 indicates the amount upon which the terms discount amount is calculated.
- TDS02 is required if the dollar value subject to discount is not equal to the dollar value of TDS01.
amount_02.title: Amount

amount_03.description:
Monetary amount.

- TDS03 is the amount of invoice due if paid by terms discount due date (total invoice or installment amount less cash discount).
amount_03.title: Amount

amount_04.description:
Monetary amount.

- TDS04 indicates the total amount of terms discount.
amount_04.title: Amount

total_monetary_value_summary_TDS.description: To specify the total invoice discounts and amounts.
total_monetary_value_summary_TDS.title: Total Monetary Value Summary

transportation_method_type_code_01.description: Code specifying the method or type of transportation for the shipment.
transportation_method_type_code_01.title: Transportation Method Type Code

equipment_initial_02.description: Prefix or alphabetic part of an equipment unit's identifying number.
equipment_initial_02.title: Equipment Initial

equipment_number_03.description: Sequencing or serial part of an equipment unit's identifying number (pure numeric form for equipment number is preferred).
equipment_number_03.title: Equipment Number

carrier_details_CAD.description: To specify transportation details for the transaction.
carrier_details_CAD.title: Carrier Details

allowance_or_charge_indicator_01.description:
Code which indicates an allowance or charge for the service specified.

- If SAC01 is "A" or "C", then at least one of SAC05, SAC07, or SAC08 is required.
allowance_or_charge_indicator_01.title: Allowance Or Charge Indicator

service_promotion_allowance_or_charge_co.description: Code identifying the service, promotion, allowance, or charge.
service_promotion_allowance_or_charge_co.title: Service Promotion Allowance Or Charge Code

amount_05.description:
Monetary amount.

- SAC05 is the total amount for the service, promotion, allowance, or charge.
- If SAC05 is present with SAC07 or SAC08, then SAC05 takes precedence.
amount_05.title: Amount

06.description: Charge to be Paid by Customer

allowance_or_charge_method_of_handling_c.description: Code indicating method of handling for an allowance or charge.
allowance_or_charge_method_of_handling_c.title: Allowance Or Charge Method Of Handling Code

description_15.description: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content.
description_15.title: Description

service_promotion_allowance_or_charge_in.description: To request or identify a service, promotion, allowance, or charge; to specify the amount or percentage for the service, promotion, allowance, or charge.
service_promotion_allowance_or_charge_in.title: Service Promotion Allowance Or Charge Information
Service Promotion Allowance Or Charge Information

number_of_units_shipped_01.description: Numeric value of units shipped in manufacturer's shipping units for a line item or transaction set.
number_of_units_shipped_01.title: Number Of Units Shipped

unit_or_basis_for_measurement_code_02.description: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken.
unit_or_basis_for_measurement_code_02.title: Unit Or Basis For Measurement Code

unit_or_basis_for_measurement_code_04.description: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken.
unit_or_basis_for_measurement_code_04.title: Unit Or Basis For Measurement Code

invoice_shipment_summary_ISS.description: To specify summary details of total items shipped in terms of quantity, weight, and volume.
invoice_shipment_summary_ISS.title: Invoice Shipment Summary

number_of_included_segments_01.description: Total number of segments included in a transaction set including ST and SE segments.
number_of_included_segments_01.title: Number Of Included Segments

transaction_set_control_number_02.description: Identifying control number that must be unique within the transaction set functional group assigned by the originator for a transaction set.
transaction_set_control_number_02.title: Transaction Set Control Number

transaction_set_trailer_SE.description: To indicate the end of the transaction set and provide the count of the transmitted segments (including the beginning (ST) and ending (SE) segments).
transaction_set_trailer_SE.title: Transaction Set Trailer
